events.name: battery value chain in electric mobility
events.wd_label: battery value chain in electric mobility
events.wd_description: The battery value chain for electric vehicles encompasses several sequential steps, from raw material extraction to the integration of batteries into vehicles, involving multiple industries and technological advancements.
events.description: The battery value chain for electric vehicles encompasses several sequential steps, from raw material extraction to the integration of batteries into vehicles, involving multiple industries and technological advancements.

events.name: extraction and processing of raw materials
events.wd_label: extraction and processing of raw materials
events.wd_description: This step involves extracting raw materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel, and processing them to make usable materials for battery components.
events.description: This step involves extracting raw materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel, and processing them to make usable materials for battery components.

events.name: synthesis of cell components
events.wd_description: Raw materials are synthesized into essential battery components such as the cathode, anode, electrolyte, and separator.
events.description: Raw materials are synthesized into essential battery components such as the cathode, anode, electrolyte, and separator.

events.name: assembly into battery stacks
events.wd_description: Synthesized components are assembled into individual cells and further packed into battery stacks.
events.description: Synthesized components are assembled into individual cells and further packed into battery stacks.

events.name: integration into vehicles
events.wd_description: Battery stacks are integrated into electric vehicles, providing the necessary power for vehicle operation.
events.description: Battery stacks are integrated into electric vehicles, providing the necessary power for vehicle operation.

events.name: actors involved in the battery value chain
events.wd_label: actors involved in the battery value chain
events.wd_description: Various industries and sectors, including automotive, specialized battery, chemical, and electronics, contribute to different stages of the battery value chain.
events.description: Various industries and sectors, including automotive, specialized battery, chemical, and electronics, contribute to different stages of the battery value chain.

events.name: automotive sector
events.wd_description: The automotive sector dominates the value creation process for vehicles with conventional and electric powertrains, focusing on developing new technologies.
events.description: The automotive sector dominates the value creation process for vehicles with conventional and electric powertrains, focusing on developing new technologies.

events.name: specialized battery sector
events.wd_description: Specialized battery firms focus on the development and manufacturing of battery cells and systems for electric vehicles.
events.description: Specialized battery firms focus on the development and manufacturing of battery cells and systems for electric vehicles.

events.name: chemical sector
events.wd_description: The chemical sector provides expertise and materials essential for battery component synthesis.
events.description: The chemical sector provides expertise and materials essential for battery component synthesis.

events.name: electronics sector
events.wd_description: The electronics sector contributes technology and innovation, particularly in cell manufacturing and battery integration.
events.description: The electronics sector contributes technology and innovation, particularly in cell manufacturing and battery integration.

events.name: technological and industry trends
events.wd_description: Trends in patenting activities reveal a high interest in R&D on individual battery materials and components, indicating a shift towards comprehensive R&D approaches across the battery value chain.
events.description: Trends in patenting activities reveal a high interest in R&D on individual battery materials and components, indicating a shift towards comprehensive R&D approaches across the battery value chain.

events.name: patenting of individual components
events.wd_description: High levels of patenting activities are focused on individual battery materials and components.
events.description: High levels of patenting activities are focused on individual battery materials and components.

events.name: patenting across value chain steps
events.wd_description: There is an increasing trend towards patenting technologies that cover multiple steps of the battery value chain.
events.description: There is an increasing trend towards patenting technologies that cover multiple steps of the battery value chain.

events.name: Patent Analysis Trends
events.description: Analysis indicating high patenting activities in the early stages of the battery value chain, with a trend towards comprehensive R&D approaches covering multiple steps.

events.name: Holistic R and D Approaches
events.description: A trend towards comprehensive R&D approaches that cover the entire battery value chain, integrating knowledge from automotive, chemical, and electronics sectors.

events.name: Challenges in Patent Analysis
events.description: Challenges in covering every value chain step with relevant IPC codes and the limitations of using patent data as a tool for technological analysis.

relations.wd_description: qualifies something (inception or end of a thing, event, or date) as happening previously to another thing
